title: Yogi
excerpt: An innovative SaaS platform for yoga students and instructors to create events, classes, and personalized profiles, featuring integrated payments and subscriptions for continuous analytics and improvement.

testimonial.name: Victoria González López
testimonial.quote: Adrian's expertise and dedication helped transform our vision into reality. The platform he built not only streamlined our operations but created a seamless experience for our yoga community.

challenge: Build a modern SaaS platform for yoga students and instructors to manage events, classes, profiles, and payments, with advanced filtering and subscription analytics, maintaining a secure and scalable architecture.
solution: We used React with Bit to build a modular and reusable UI, along with Node.js and Express on the backend for a robust API. Passport was implemented for secure authentication, Tailwind CSS for clean and responsive design, and ChatGM to enhance the UI experience. Tankstack was integrated to optimize API calls, ensuring performance and scalability.
